Verses: 1 oruvan Pojanapaliyaagiya Kaanikkaiyaik Karththarukku Seluththavendumaanaal, Avan Kaanikkai Melliya Maavaayiruppadhaaga; Avan Adhinmel Enney Vaarththu, Adhinmel Thoobavarkkam Pottu,

2 adhai Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyargalidaththil Konduvaruvaanaaga; Appozhudhu Aasaariyan Andha Maavilum Enneyilum Oru Kaippidi Niraiya Thoobavarkkam Ellaavatrodum Eduththu, Adhaip Palipeedaththinmel Gnaabagakkuriyaagath Thaganikkakkadavan; Adhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali.
3 andhap Pojanapaliyil Meedhiyaayiruppadhu Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Serum; Karththarukku Idum Thaganapaligalil Idhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.

4 nee Padaippadhu Aduppil Paagampannappatta Pojanapaliyaanaal, Adhu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Seydha Pulippillaa Adhirasangalaayaavadhu, Enney Poosappatta Pulippillaa Adaigalaayaavadhu Iruppadhaaga.
5 nee Padaippadhu Thattaiyaana Sattiyil Paagampannappatta Pojanapaliyaanaal, Adhu Enneyile Pisaindha Pulippillaa Melliya Maavinaal Seyyappattadhaayiruppadhaaga.
6 adhaith Thundu Thundaagap Pittu, Adhinmel Enney Vaarppaayaaga; Idhu Oru Pojanapali.
7 nee Padaippadhu Porikkun Chattiyil Paagampannappatta Pojanapaliyaanaal, Adhu Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavinaal Seyyappaduvadhaaga.
8 ippadi Seyyappatta Pojanapaliyaik Karththarukku Seluththuvaayaaga; Adhu Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvarappadumpodhu, Avan Adhaip Palipeedaththandaiyil Konduvandhu,
9 andhap Pojanapaliyilirundhu Aasaariyan Gnaabagak Kuriyaaga Oru Pangai Eduththup Palipeedaththinmel Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapali.
10 indhap Pojanapaliyil Meedhiyaanadhu Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Serum; Karththarukku Idum Thaganangalil Idhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.

11 neengal Karththarukku Seluththum Endha Pojanapaliyum Puliththamaavinaal Seyyappadaadhiruppadhaaga; Puliththamaavulladhondraiyum Thenulladhondraiyum Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyaagath Thaganikkavendaam.
12 mudharkanigalaik Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvandhu, Avaigalaik Karththarukku Seluththalaam; Aanaalum, Palipeedaththinmel Avaigal Sugandha Vaasanaiyaagath Thaganikkappadalaagaadhu.
13 nee Padaikkira Endha Pojanapaliyum Uppinaal Saaramaakkappaduvadhaaga; Un Dhevanin Udanpadikkaiyin Uppai Un Pojanapaliyile Kuraiyavidaamal, Nee Padaippadhu Ellaavatrodum Uppaiyum Padaippaayaaga.
14 mudharpalangalai Pojanapaliyaaga Nee Karththarukku Seluththavandhaal, Niraindha Pachchaiyaana Kadhirgalai Neruppile Vaatti Udhirththu, Adhai Un Mudharpalanin Pojanapaliyaaga Konduvarakkadavaai.
15 adhinmel Enney Vaarththu, Adhinmel Thoobavarkkaththaip Poduvaayaaga; Idhu Oru Pojanapali.
16 pinbu Aasaariyan, Udhirththa Dhaaniyaththilum Enneyilum Eduththu, Gnaabagak Kuriyaana Pangai Adhin Thoobavarkkam Ellaavatrodunkoodath Thaganikkakkadavan; Idhu Karththarukku Idum Thaganapali.
